comment: A pair of an empty set (of edges) and a second set (of vertices) is a closed walk if and only if the second set contains exactly one vertex (in an undirected graph). (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 15-Mar-2018.) (Revised by AV, 17-Feb-2021.) (Revised by AV, 30-Oct-2021.)
